newsitem.title: USA: Wall Street stocks open steady to higher.
newsitem.headline: Wall Street stocks open steady to higher.

text.p: Wall Street stocks opened steady to higher on Wednesday as strong openings in Philip Morris Cos Inc and International Business Machines Corp pushed the Dow industrials to early gains.
The Dow industrials was up five to 5,716 in early trade. The NASDAQ Index was up two to 1,151, while S&P Index was unchanged at 666
The 30-year U.S. Treasury bond was up 2/32 to yield 6.97 percent.
